import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'], standalone: false, }) export class FooterComponent { footerSubscribe(){ alert('Thank you! You have subscribed.') } }
